entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:10 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 03:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: S 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Flurries beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries becoming mixed with a few rain showers and periods of drizzle near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. A few rain showers and periods of drizzle early in the evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. High zero. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
